text.__SUMMARY__: Prunus rigida, is a species of shrub or tree in the family Rosaceae. It is native to Peru and Bolivia.P. rigida grows up to 6 meters tall. Leaves are rigid, ovate-lanceolate in shape, up to 15 cm long, with toothed margin. Flowers are arranged in racemes up to 6 cm long.
